description: This header file defines internal API prototypes for the CCSP_CR component, including functions for profile loading, capability registration, namespace management, component discovery, session handling, and utility functions within the CCSP Software Platform.

methods.name: CcspCrLoadDeviceProfile
methods.description: Loads the device profile within the CCSP_CR component.

methods.name: CcspCrLoadComponentProfile
methods.description: Loads the component profile from an XML handle.

methods.name: CcspCrLoadRemoteCRInfo
methods.description: Loads remote component registration info from an XML handle.

methods.name: CcspCrRegisterCapabilities
methods.description: Registers capabilities of a component for a given namespace.

methods.name: CcspCrUnregisterNamespace
methods.description: Unregisters a namespace for a component.

methods.name: CcspCrUnregisterComponent
methods.description: Unregisters a component.

methods.name: CcspCrDiscoverComponentSupportingNamespace
methods.description: Discovers components supporting a specific namespace.

methods.name: CcspCrDiscoverComponentSupportingDynamicTbl
methods.description: Discovers components supporting a namespace with dynamic table support.

methods.name: CcspCrCheckNamespaceDataType
methods.description: Checks data type of a namespace.

methods.name: CcspCrGetRegisteredComponents
methods.description: Retrieves the list of registered components.

methods.name: CcspCrGetNamespaceByComponent
methods.description: Gets the namespace associated with a component.

methods.name: CcspCrAfterComponentLost
methods.description: Handles cleanup after a component is lost.

methods.name: CcspCrRequestSessionID
methods.description: Requests a new session ID with a specified priority.

methods.name: CcspCrGetCurrentSessionID
methods.description: Retrieves the current session ID and its priority.

methods.name: CcspCrInformEndOfSession
methods.description: Informs that a session has ended.

methods.name: CcspCrLookforRemoteCR
methods.description: Searches for a remote CR with a specific prefix.

methods.name: CcspCrLookforComponent
methods.description: Finds a component by name.

methods.name: CcspCrCleanAll
methods.description: Cleans all internal data or state.

methods.name: CcspCrDumpObject
methods.description: Dumps internal object state for debugging.

methods.name: CcspCrIsSystemReady
methods.description: Checks if the system is ready.

methods.name: CcspCrSetPrefix
methods.description: Sets the prefix for the component.
